WorkItem.Description: When trying to edit the ControlTemplate for the CalendarItem, Exceptions are thrown.  If I comment out the two Grids: "PART_MonthView" & "PART_YearView".  The exceptions go away.

Comments.Message:
Hi Jeff,

I'm not able to repro this in Blend 1 or Blend 2.  The steps I followed was adding a Calendar, right clicking on Calendar and choosing "Edit Control Parts (Template)", then in the Calendar template, right clicking on Calendar Item and choosing to edit the template again (through "Edit Control Parts (Template)"), then changed various properties on the parts in the template.  I didn't hit any exceptions.

If you have other repro steps for us to try, please reopen the bug and let us know.

Thanks!
Samantha
